entry.title: To The Heavens And All Who Hear Us: Behold All We Have Made
entry.summary:
Author: BlackUnicorn

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 11,806Chapters: 3/4Kudos: 45

Summary: And Chim just couldn't not say it because the sandwich tasted like ashes on his tongue and his ears were ringing and all he could think about was how Buck had been so happy lately and how Buck was going to be so unhappy soon. ‚ÄúAre you in love with Eddie?‚Äù he blurted out, completely steamrolling over whatever else Tommy had been saying and stopping him dead in his tracks, making him almost choke on his stupidly fancy BLT. Once Tommy had stopped coughing, his eyes still a little watery and his voice still a little raw, he croaked out, ‚ÄúExcuse me?‚Äù ***Tommy is Buck's boyfriend. Eddie is Buck's partner. It's really not that complicated.

entry.title: L is for the way you Lose Me
entry.summary:
Author: FantasyandFlowers

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 6,166Chapters: 4/?Kudos: 25

Summary: ‚ÄúBuck, have you seen Eddie?‚Äù Bobby sounds panicked.‚ÄúWhat- no? Have you?‚Äù‚ÄúNo, where are you now?‚Äù‚ÄúI‚Äôm at his house; it looks like someone destroyed it,‚Äù Buck‚Äôs voice falters, shaking with each word. Why is Bobby so terrified?‚ÄúHe‚Äôs not at home?‚Äù Bobby asks with a serious tone.‚ÄúNo, what‚Äôs going on?‚Äù Buck asks. Suddenly, the world is spinning; this is all wrong. Eddie should be here. Where is he?‚ÄúThey just found Eddie‚Äôs car abandoned on the side of the road.‚Äù‚ÄúNo.‚Äù Buck starts shaking his head. This can‚Äôt be happening. No. Eddie was headed home to talk to Christopher last night. He wasn‚Äôt supposed to go anywhere else.‚ÄúStay there, kid. I‚Äôm already on my way to you,‚Äù Bobby says.‚ÄúWhere‚Äôs Eddie?‚Äù Buck asks. He knows it‚Äôs childish, a pointless question that Bobby can‚Äôt answer.‚ÄúWe‚Äôll find him,‚Äù Bobby reassures.orEddie is getting ready to move to Texas, but why can't he shake this feeling he has towards leaving Buck behind? Buck wants to tell Eddie how he feels, but he would never ask Eddie to choose between him and Christopher. But they both lose their chance to confess anything when Eddie is mysteriously kidnapped with no leads.

entry.title: the song of asystole
entry.summary:
Author: edsdiaz

Summary: He walks in with his head down, hoping that he can just slip in and out.‚ÄúOh, there he is!‚Äù Eddie freezes in his tracks.Now, he‚Äôs aware grief is different for everyone and can make a person act irrationally, but does it make a person hallucinate their best friend who they just saw dead? entry.title: What Do You Call A Gay Dinosaur? A Homosaurus Rex
entry.summary:
Author: SeanDR

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 13,336Chapters: 5/?Kudos: 13

Summary: After an altercation with Owen Grady gets his Security Partner reassigned, PaleoVet Evan 'Buck' Buckley gets a new S.P. in rookie Eddie Diaz. The two try to learn to get along all while sidestepping Grady, who has it out for BuckBut when the Indominus Rex breaks out right after they drop Eddie's son Chris off at a new camp on the island, the two must race to save Chris while dealing with their own feelings.Inspired by a fanart by @erosbuddie on Twitterhttps://x.com/erosbuddie/status/1892718287739331048?t=Us1b8Qy0emW3uBjOB8YgkA&s=19
